author: jeremias
msg: Replaced the PostScript filters with the refactored ones from the maintenance
Added a RunLengthEncode filter for the PostScript renderer.

author: pbwest
msg: Denied addops on relative lengths, and restricted multops on relative
lengths to numbers.  Restricted multops on absolute lengths to numbers
and absolute lengths.  Added expandEms() and expandPercent() methods
for resolution of relative lengths, after denying direct multops.

author: pietsch
msg: Changed error handling and detection of markers which
are not initial children of their parent.

author: pietsch
msg: Wrapper does now set the TextState.
